messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.

Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Inito. Product description:  fertility hormone tracking device that measures and analyzes multiple fertility hormones to provide cycle insights and predict/confirm ovulation

preferred_output.content: Five reasons why I use Inito to track my fertility. One, Inito shows actual values of your hormones and they analyze your data into charts. These personalized insights help you better understand your cycle. Two, Inito tracks four fertility hormones in one strip. Three, store-bought ovulation kits aren't that accurate. I got so many false positives because my LH levels would rise more than once a month. And it happens to almost 50% of people. Four, Inito tracks and actually confirms ovulation. Since an ovulation is the number one cause of infertility, you need to check when you're actually ovulating, not just guessing when you are. Five, it's so easy to use. Inito tells you when to take a test and gives fertility predictions, taking out all the guesswork. If you want a full picture of what's going on in your body, then use Inito.

non_preferred_output.content: Discover clarity and confidence on your fertility journey with Inito—the advanced fertility hormone tracking device. Inito measures and analyzes multiple fertility hormones, delivering comprehensive insights into your menstrual cycle. With accurate ovulation prediction and confirmation, Inito empowers you with the knowledge you need to make informed decisions about your reproductive health. Experience personalized, science-backed support every step of the way—because every day matters on your path to parenthood.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.

Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Inito. Product description:  fertility tracker that measures and analyzes four fertility hormones to provide personalized analysis of the fertility cycle.

preferred_output.content: Quick question, how much do you think you know about fertility? I don't know, I just got here. Do you want to test your knowledge? Let's do it! Let's go. What do you know about ovulation? Ovulation, um... How many times a month does a woman release an egg? Um, it takes like seven days? Can a woman get pregnant on her period? I want to say yes. When can a woman get pregnant in a month? When she gets fertilized, I guess? Since you can only get pregnant for six days in a cycle, and most people don't know when these six days are, the best way to track and confirm ovulation is with Inito. It gives you easy-to-read hormone charts that can confirm ovulation. Inito is a fertility tracker that measures and analyzes four fertility hormones, giving a data-driven, personalized analysis of your fertility cycle. It's like having a mini fertility clinic right in your home.

non_preferred_output.content: Discover Inito—the advanced fertility tracker designed for those seeking clarity on their reproductive health. Inito analyzes four key fertility hormones, offering a comprehensive and personalized overview of your fertility cycle. With precise, science-backed insights, Inito empowers you to understand your body's natural rhythms, predict fertile windows with greater accuracy, and make informed decisions on your journey to parenthood. Take control of your fertility with Inito—where knowledge meets confidence.
